title: Senior Quality Assurance [Hà Nội] - Attractive Income, Atleast 2 Years Experienced
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH DỊCH VỤ TFS
job_description:
Compliance & Quality Assurance Planning:
Develop a compliance and quality assurance plan aligned with internal policies, procedures.
Identify key controls for monitoring loan processing, underwriting, disbursement, and collections to ensure compliance with policies and regulatory requirements.
Establish an audit framework for periodic branch reviews and compliance assessments.
Execution & Monitoring:
Conduct objective evaluations of actual branch practices against established policies and process controls.
Perform regular audits of branch operations, ensuring adherence to loan origination, approval, and servicing guidelines.
Execute quality checks on loan applications, underwriting decisions, and disbursements to ensure compliance with regulatory and internal standards.
Conduct file audits to detect process gaps, fraudulent activities, and operational risks.
Collect and document objective evidence to verify compliance with applied policies and procedures
Issue Identification & Risk Mitigation:
Identify non-compliance issues, assess their impact, and evaluate potential risks related to lending operations.
Recommend process improvements to enhance efficiency, accuracy, and fraud prevention.
Ensure that action owners clearly understand compliance issues and commit to implementing corrective actions.
Track and validate the implementation of corrective actions until completion.
Reporting & Communication:
Prepare and submit comprehensive assurance reports detailing findings, risks, and recommended actions to process owners and action owners.
Communicate compliance findings and required improvements to branch management and operational teams.
Provide regular management review reports to the CMD and senior leadership.
requirements:
BS degree in banking or Finance, law, economic,
Have work experience as auditor or internal auditor or compliance, or quality assurance, preferable in lending, financial, banking, etc.
Ability to understand key controls of process or policy according to the regulations
Ability to constructively evaluate the policy and process, and driving the policy and process to be applied in the practice
Ability to manipulate large amounts of data and to compile detailed reports
Proven knowledge of auditing standards and procedures, laws, rules and regulations
High attention to detail and excellent analytical skills
Sound independent judgment
Ability to collect, analyze, evaluate, and synthesize information
Ability to work independently, work in teams, make plans.
